text: Mauria is a genus of plants in the family Anacardiaceae. ==Taxonomy== ===Species=== , Plants of the World online has 15 accepted species: {| |- valign=top | * Mauria boliviana * Mauria cuatrecasasii * Mauria denticulata * Mauria ferruginea * Mauria heterophylla * Mauria killipii * Mauria kunthii * Mauria membranifolia | * Mauria obtusifolia * Mauria peruviana * Mauria sericea * Mauria simplicifolia * Mauria subserrata * Mauria thaumatophylla * Mauria trichothyrsa |} ==References== Category:Anacardiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mauria
